reporting_cycle: The Panel of Experts to provide a mid-term briefing and a final report at the end of its mandated period; neighbouring States to report to the Committee quarterly
summary:
9. Calls on States to provide information on violations of the arms embargo.

10. Invites neighbouring States to report quarterly on their efforts.

11. Calls on regional organizations to assist in implementing the arms embargo.

12. Expresses determination to review the situation based on the Panel's reports.

13. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
